title: Secret Court Order for Journalist Surveillance Issued Day Before Barr Resignation
summary: DOJ obtains secret court order for Washington Post journalist surveillance on December 23, 2020, one day before Attorney General William Barr steps down. Order seeks to uncover leakers of classified information in three Russia-related articles, demonstrating systematic coordination between DOJ leadership and surveillance operations targeting investigative journalism.

sources.title: Trump DOJ tried to seize Washington Post journalists records over Russia leaks
